website_summaries.verdict: A great golf chipping net for those who want to perfect their short game.
pros: Pop-up design that you can set up in seconds
Net designed for easy transport and storage
Sold with handy nylon carrying bag
Includes 3 targets to help improve your accuracy
cons: Very lightweight net can blow down in windy conditions
A little flimsy compared to some

customer_reviews.title: Great Chipping Target!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great chipping net and I'd highly recommend it. It's sturdy and easy to assemble/store. The only thing it lacks is magical powers to attract my ball into the net. But, it has inspired me to keep trying
customer_reviews.author: TedeBear

customer_reviews.title: There are other nets that are exactly the same, but much cheaper and not Rukket branded.
customer_reviews.text: For the build quality, this product should be a little cheaper. 1. The build isn't strong enough for real golf balls unless you are chipping from less than 5 feet away. 1a. Hitting the product with a real golf ball makes it sway and spring around. 1b. Using the stakes to hold it down still doesn't keep it upright at ball impact. 2. I expected better customer support and service from Rukket. 2a. Shipping took forever regardless of prime shipping (3 weeks). 2b. I contacted Rukket about my order 3 weeks ago and still haven't received a response.
customer_reviews.author: BobZilla

customer_reviews.title: Seems a good product for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Good price. I used regular balls and it was a nice target. Would be nice to have a bit of detailed tips insofar as chipping with the light, practice balls included. And what is the goal with regular balls? Should I be shooting for the target? If so, how far in front of the cup should I imagine that target? And are the middle one a target for 1 bounce to the cup? And the bottom one if I want the ball to roll to the cup? If you come up with these tips, will you let me know? I'd like a copy. You can send them to my email address and I'll bump up your star rating.
customer_reviews.author: hooah

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Disappointing--returned immediately.
customer_reviews.text: I paid up for the Rukket because about 4 months prior I bought their full size hitting net. That absolutely gets 5+ stars. I didn't even feel the need to read the chipping net reviews--I just purchased both this one and the XL version because I thought they would be the same quality. They are not. Both are extremely flimsy and poorly made. The foam practice balls should have been the dead give-a-way... You can probably use real golf balls, but it doesn't look like it will stand up to prolonged practice.
customer_reviews.author: E.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little net.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little net. I have used others in the past but the "skee ball" style setup gives you the chance to try a dial up the difficulty / accuracy. Super easy setup. Just 2 little "tent poles" and your up and running. Takes literally 20 seconds. This is not picky and not a "fault" with the product but I do wish there were some little stakes or something to secure this. It will blow over if there as any sort of wind gust hitting the backside of the net. This is the only reason it isn't 5 stars. Would recommend this to friends
customer_reviews.author: kris johnson

customer_reviews.title: good in concept – but not heavy-duty enough
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't buy it again because it's too flimsy. Mine didn't pop up correctly – I think the springy steel was slightly deformed. And once it's up, if there's any wind – which we have a lot of in Hawaii – it blows over.I've had to do some extra staking to make it work for me and that goes against the idea of a portable, foldable training aid. It does its job as an accuracy trainer so I can't complain about that. Set up is the issue.
customer_reviews.author: KimoKailua

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Engineered.
customer_reviews.text: This thing leans to the left and gets worse as you chip balls into it. I live with it but it's quite annoying. It's very light and will blow away/over with a light gust (I put a brick on the back of it to keep this from happening). Just find something else! (and let me know if it works)
customer_reviews.author: clay

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use, great concept. The issue is with packing it away in the storage bag once finished. Three adults tried for half an hour to fold the target back into the circular shape with no luck. We followed the instructions and looked at the "questions" section here on Amazon. I am now worried that we have twisted the frame so much that it will not set up properly the next time we want to use it. Quite disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Mc

customer_reviews.title: Great for inside use
customer_reviews.text: I live in a smaller apartment and use this inside. While it is easy to set up and I can tell it will last for a while, it isn't as sturdy as I hoped. After using it a few times, I can tell that the net doesn't stand up straight, and instead leans a little bit to the left. However, it does the job for me. I would recommend buying nicer foam golf balls than the ones that come with this net as they do not nearly represent a real golf ball.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my dad as a Christmas present. He has a big outdoor practice net, but I wanted something he could use in the basement or garage on bad-weather days. He uses it pretty often and it's held up well. He loves that it folds for storage in between uses and that the ball-catch pockets are nice and deep so the ball doesn't come flying back out. Great gift idea for the golfer in your life!
customer_reviews.author: IluvMycat

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. I use it indoors. It does not come with ground stakes which could be a problem outdoors. You'll have to supply your own tent pegs and tie downs. Grandchildren had fun over Easter tossing Nerf balls at the targets. We got our money's worth already from it.
customer_reviews.author: Micky D

customer_reviews.title: Everything I wanted in a chipping net.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice chipping net. Goes together extremely easy. I love the practice balls that come with it. My 6 year old took the first shot at it. Hit the top target on his first swing. He was pretty happy with himself. We play a game with it. Top hole is 4 points middle 3 points bottom 2 points sides 1 point. Each player takes 10 shots. Player with most points win.
customer_reviews.author: D. L.

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I am using the Skee-Golf target inside a 10x10x10 golf cage indoors and it works great. It sits on a artificial putting mat and is nice and stable. Some other reviewers complained that it tips over on grass and I can see that happening as the unit has very little weight. by its self. I think this will be very useful for practicing "hitting your spot". It is very portable and can be set up in a couple of seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Ronan

customer_reviews.title: Buy with confidence
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. It is easy to set up and take down. I like the three holes for precision accuracy. Some reviews have complained about folding it to put it back in the bag, but it is not that difficult. If you have ever owned a child's collapsible soccer net, you will have no problem returning this to the bag. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: JerrodTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Quality product for backyard practice.
customer_reviews.text: This item is very easy to assemble. It provides an excellent target for chipping and pitching golf balls in the backyard. Durable and lightweight, It comes with ground stakes to anchor it to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph DeRosa

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, but we are not going to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, but we are not going to get much use out of it. It is too flimsy. A breeze sends it toppling over in our yard. After keeping it popped open in our garage, it is already leaning to one side, on its way to a permanent collapse. This was something my 6 year old picked out as a birthday gift for his golf fanatic older brother, but he would have done better to just get some golf balls.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Banks

customer_reviews.title: Visible target
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, fold away and store; fun target for chipping practice - indoors or out; complete with stakes and foam balls; I’ll be using it outdoors with regular golf balls; looks like it will be fairly rugged and easy to clean. Away with the bushel and bucket!
customer_reviews.author: Graduate '03

customer_reviews.title: Fun target..... for a bit anyway.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun target for chipping but I question the quality. It is what it is but after using it for a season it doesn't sit strait and some of the metal eyelets that hold the rods are starting to tear out. I gave it a 4 because I've had a years worth of fun for what I felt was a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: ok quality net
customer_reviews.text: fast shipper, nice quality but needs to be improved just a bit. When you get a few normal golf balls rather than foam or plastic practice balls the unit start to lean to the left. I'm guessing weight of ball makes it lean.
customer_reviews.author: indymojo

customer_reviews.title: It's the perfect chipping net for indoors
customer_reviews.text: Came on time, and exactly as described. It's the perfect chipping net for indoors. Personally I think it's a little flimsy to use outside with real golf balls. It does come with stakes, but it is still flimsy for that. Otherwise its a great net and I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little chipping target! Not at all bulky like the old hoop net that I carried in my car, this folds up flat very small. Even if you don’t keep a full set of clubs in your vehicle ,just your favorite chipping iron and this target will take up no room.Comes with a full set of foam balls for indoor use
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Very easy set up and easy to use in a small ...
customer_reviews.text: Very easy set up and easy to use in a small yard. The practice balls work well, allows the swing to be true. Only improvement comment is if it could be a little heavier, the wind tends to blow it to the side or just moves it. It was easily solve by putting two of my corn hole bags on the back of it, you may want to include a little weight in the product. Otherwise, fun product that I enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: dale walter

customer_reviews.title: Whats not to like?
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product. It's simple, durable, light... can't ask for much more. Folding it back up is simple once you get the hang of it. Stores easily. Allows some nice, casual practice time in the backyard. Even made a game of it when I had a few buddies over.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for golfers of any age
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a little four year old who’s crazy about golf. It was a hit! He plays with it in the yard & when the weather doesn’t permit him to be out, he plays inside. A future “Tiger Woods” in the making!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne  B

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing color and quality
customer_reviews.text: The red was definitely orange. It was a gift so it was opened in front of us. I was disappointed in both the color and quality. I was expecting a foldable tent style item from the description but it is very thin. We cheap kids pop up tents that have better material. I cant imagine it will last long.
customer_reviews.author: storkgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great chipping net
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my father for a gift and he is using it all the time this winter practicing in his basement for summer.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfie

customer_reviews.title: Super happy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had initially ordered this to use as a game at a golf tourney i put on every year. Which it worked GREAT for my initial needs. Now my husband has claimed it and loves using to practice his chipping in the yard. Love the ease of setting it up and it seems to be quite durable with the abuse it's taking from the chipping practice! Will be purchasing from Rukket again when I have more golf needs!! This was a great Amazon find!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Garrett

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this one in the beginning very well made easy easy setup couldn’t be happier
customer_reviews.text: I bought another brand for ten bucks was a piece of junk should’ve bought this one in the beginning very well made easy easy setup couldn’t be happier
customer_reviews.author: Mark Crunk

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this chipping target net for my husband's birthday ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chipping target net for my husband's birthday. He immediately set it up. I think we will buy a second one and use it as a game with some of those whiffle golf balls.
customer_reviews.author: D. Walbeck

customer_reviews.title: I purchased one for my son and he absolutely loved it. He is an avid golfer and he ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one for my son and he absolutely loved it. He is an avid golfer and he said it was particularly great because with this one he could practice inside. I bought a second one for a friend , he said he had been looking at them but would most likely never use it because he lives right next to a golf course. So that was the only reason I returned the second one, but as I said. .my son raved about his.
customer_reviews.author: snapshot7

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift, I have not given it to anyone as yet. Even after Christmas, I would not be able to rate this product, as It is not for me.
customer_reviews.author: mara

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works great inside and outside. Really easy to put together,and folds quickly back into the carrying case
customer_reviews.author: Tim Murray

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff👍
customer_reviews.text: Works great my husband and son love it although the logo is printed upside down it’s exactly what I expected!
customer_reviews.author: kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to set up. Targets are decent sized for 20 us chips. Downside is that it needs some sort of cross bar support. In a light wind, the top kinda falls over to the side, and any subsequent ball hit on that side knocks it down. Would also be nice to have a few cheap tent stakes. Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.author: Jeff T

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps falling over! Will not stay up right once balls get into pockets it falls over.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nce easy to use super lightweight , seems a lil cheaply made for the money hwever i really like it
customer_reviews.author: Joe Graves

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up, durable, portable
customer_reviews.text: Love that it all fits in its own carry bag. Takes about 10 seconds to set up! Folds down small enough to take just about anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice! Got for my boyfriend and he’s used once so far and he says it’s really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Nice little practice aid.
customer_reviews.text: Works well with real golf balls if you stake it down with the included staple stakes.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: very fun, helped my chipping game a lot
customer_reviews.text: fun for inside the apartment, good chipping practice, easy to set up and put away.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great weekend activity! My friends and family love using this.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Norwood

customer_reviews.title: Chipping Net
customer_reviews.text: Great way to practice chip shot indoors or outdoors. Portable and easily transported.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Great chipping net! The foam balls are great to practice with.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole G

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: The product is a described (though a little smaller than I thought). Easy to set up and put away.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: As we all know, it's all about the short game in golf. I can honestly say I need more than a lot of practice. Using this product proved to be a lot of fun. My grandchildren, as well as many adults love it and make up many scoring games. Hours of fun while practicing the ever important chip shot. Now if I can just learn to Putt!
customer_reviews.author: pattyjane

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to assemble. Lightweight and very portable. Stores nicely in it’s compact carrying case. Highly recommend... It’d make an excellent Father’s Day gift!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Mosher

customer_reviews.title: Hard to fold-up and put away.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and very easy to set up. The problem is folding it properly to put it away. The paper instructions are not detailed enough. I couldn't find an online video for my model.
customer_reviews.author: R. Peck

customer_reviews.title: flimsy / not sturdy / collapses too easily
customer_reviews.text: quality of construction materials is ok, but the net does not stay erect / upright which is very frustrating. Can only chip 3 balls into top target pocket before the entire net collapses.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Mcgarry

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas, perfect for any avid golfer, folds up easily!
customer_reviews.author: leah

customer_reviews.title: Golf buff
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves playing with this in our bedroom, living room or backyard... anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: too flimsy
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my son-in-law and honestly, I was embarrassed when I saw the product in person. It looked cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my father in law. He practices with the grandkids in the living room. I thought this might save a picture or the tv with an excitable child shot. He loves it, my brother in laws took it out both Christmas and the grand kids had to wait 😂😂. I foresee giving this more in the future . Very pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Pyle

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a Father's Day gift for my husband ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Father's Day gift for my husband. Came home from work 2 days later and he was in the yard using it. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: rjsmama

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the family
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my kids to practice their chipping...for indoor and outdoor use...and it has been a hit! Hours spent playing together and as a family too! They came up with point values for each hole and love playing.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Cool chipping net.
customer_reviews.text: Finally came a day after they said it would be delivered. Seems pretty cool. A little hard to put back into storage case though, will check out the you tube video maybe that will help.
customer_reviews.author: Ezgoin

customer_reviews.title: He stated it is a nice practice tool
customer_reviews.text: I purchased chipping net for my husband as a Christmas gift. He stated it is a nice practice tool, he loves that it is moveable and he can carry it to the park, to work and the back yard.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Great for wintertime practice indoors
customer_reviews.text: Great for wintertime practice indoors....especially if ball contact is a challenge. If I had to make a change it would be to make it taller but i can see where that might affect the folding.
customer_reviews.author: JB63

customer_reviews.title: Loses it's shape after a few chips...
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to get this chipping net, but just messing around with it in my living room, it's flimsy and can barely hold a sleeve of balls before tipping over. Look at the images other people have posted - this is what it will look like with minimal use. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Giunta

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun practice aid to use indoors with he included practice balls.
customer_reviews.author: mnk

customer_reviews.title: He said it is awesome and loves the target shooting
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Grandson for his Birthday! He said it is awesome and loves the target shooting!
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This is made for a child, golf balls aren’t real.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Stanek

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Easy set up. Seems durable. Helps with chipping a ton. I will say you cam get this same thing cheaper. Still a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Loring

customer_reviews.title: and it blows over easily in even a light breeze
customer_reviews.text: Did not come as advertised - was missing one of the grommets for the rear stakes to hold the whole thing up, and it blows over easily in even a light breeze.
customer_reviews.author: AFransen

customer_reviews.title: Fun golf pass time for rainy days.
customer_reviews.text: A good way to practice chipping for indoors or out.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like photo. Purchased this for my son as he is just learning how to golf. It is really nice. The color is a little brighter than photo. My son has used it outside and inside. Folds easy.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Great learning tool!!️
customer_reviews.text: I thinks it a great way to learn how to do a chip shot!!️
customer_reviews.author: Candace Smith

customer_reviews.title: He has limited space to practice and he seemed to really like it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my father's 84th birthday. He has limited space to practice and he seemed to really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and works good. A little hard to disassemble the first time but once you figure it out, it becomes easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Bonk

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. Received on time and was easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Earth2Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My father in law loves golf and said this would be perfect for it!!! He was so happy with it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Wright

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a kid learning to golf
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is great for a kid learning to golf. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: JENIFER MANTHEI

customer_reviews.title: husband LOVES this! Practices in the living room on ...
customer_reviews.text: husband LOVES this! Practices in the living room on the carpet and also outside.
customer_reviews.author: B&C

customer_reviews.title: OK, but you can do better.
customer_reviews.text: OK, but you can do better for the money. Feels a little cheap and was a lot smaller than I thought it would be. Wouldn't stand up completely straight, then starts to sag when you hit balls into the top two pockets. For double the price you can get a full practice net with targets if you have the room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ummmmm... clearly the quality checks aren’t up to “par”
customer_reviews.text: I got a defective model. The target is upside down. Boooooo.
customer_reviews.author: Nate G

customer_reviews.title: Decent net and underweight balls, may end up ruining the game
customer_reviews.text: Balls are about half the weight of real golf balls and swing in the air. May end up ruining the game. The net is decent but not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for practicing in the backyard
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited about this net. I play on a JR PGA league and always want to work on my short game. This is perfect for me to practice in my yard or in nearby fields when I can't get to the course. This will help me work on my accuracy, plus it folds up and doesn't take up a lot of room.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M Schatz

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product works fairly well, if there's any sort of wind tho it starts to blow over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and good price..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas and he actually uses it in the house. It's the perfect size!
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Beware, if you work on your short game your scores will go down.
customer_reviews.text: It will be wobbly, to fix this, just tie the elastic straps together in the middle with wee bit of string as to form an X. It'll hold up to golf balls.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Craig Harris

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Cat broke this the first day it was set up. Very disappointing because it had such good reviews. No durable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Danyell D

customer_reviews.title: Setup was easy, 3 individual nets are fun for making a ...
customer_reviews.text: Setup was easy, 3 individual nets are fun for making a game out of chipping. Would highly recommend for the money!

customer_reviews.title: Great Net
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and enjoyable. Could come with better balls

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good price for what you get. Small bag for the balls is a great addition

customer_reviews.title: Save 20 strokes
customer_reviews.text: THIS THING IS INCREDIBLE!! MUST BUY TO IMPROVE GOLF GAME. MY FRIENDS AND I PLAY BEER CHIP WITH IT...SAME RULES AS CORNHOLE/BAGS
customer_reviews.author: Don Juan

customer_reviews.title: Looks to be a good product. I bought it ass a gift so ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks to be a good product. I bought it ass a gift so I have not seen it being used. I will update the review at a later time.
customer_reviews.author: Jlp1976

customer_reviews.title: Best chipping net!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd chipping net that I've tried over the last 4 years and it's my last! The Pop-Up Skee chipping net works so well I am done with all others. It's super easy to set up and take down, and great to hit balls at. It stays in place and doesn't move when the balls enter and land in it's netting. I highly recommend getting this net if you are in the market.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: loving it!
customer_reviews.text: They thought of everything! Easy, compact and quick to setup. I'm impressed and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Marcel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son in law. He is really enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has improved her chipping by using this to practice with. Love it.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who loves golf, if he is not playing golf he’s watching golf! Thanks Tom

customer_reviews.title: smaller and more flimsy than I expected. But the ...
customer_reviews.text: smaller and more flimsy than I expected. But the child I bought it for didn't want me to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Is better place a car wheel for
customer_reviews.text: This product is a joke. Impossible to keep rise by itself. Is better place a car wheel for practice

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed on how flimsy the net is in mild wind conditions.
customer_reviews.author: J Leal

customer_reviews.title: My dad and his granddaughter have fun with this
customer_reviews.text: Skeet ball meets archery, but it's golf! My dad and his granddaughter have fun with this.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Bratton

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. Used for 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Used for 2 weeks, easy to set up and disassemble. Appears to be quite sturdy. Easily adaptable to indoor use. Only "con" I see is that it's a bit unstable due to the light weight - needs added weight on back edges to keep it from moving about while in use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great until, you have to get it back into ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great until, you have to get it back into the carry bag. Followed the instructions and it bent the inner wire that helps it keep its shape and now won't stand properly or fold up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great multifunction product for price point.

product_meta.title: Rukket Pop Up Golf Chipping Net | Outdoor/Indoor Golfing Target Accessories and Backyard Practice Swing Game with 12 Foam Training Balls
feature_bullets: SHORT GAME GURU: sharpen your skills with the ultimate folding golf chipping net! This bundle includes (1) Rukket Pop Up Golf Chipping Net, (12) Rukket Sports Foam Practice Balls and (1) Rukket Carry Bag.
USER-FRIENDLY: easy pop-up design with simple storage instruction for ideal indoor or outdoors use.
PUTT LESS, CHIP IN MORE: features three targets to improve your accuracy for the ultimate challenge.
READY-TO-GO PRACTICE: nylon carrying bag included for easy portability from home to office to tailgate!
GOLF ANYWHERE: 20 in. x 25 in. x 20 in. to fit right in the corner of your office (Great gift for a golfing boss)!
